body:
Hi Everybody,



I am studying the LB and HB, I can use "Honeybee_addHBGlz" to add glass of windows, but I dont know how to add frame of windows to wall.



Can I get some helping from someone, thanks advance.



Solon.
topic: How to add frame of window to wall

replies.body:
Hi,

Can you not use a U-value that accounts for the frame as well?

Hi Devang,

Thank you for your reply,



I am not sure whether I understood your means, it seems your suggestion is that: calculate the U value of whole windows which includes glass and frame, then set the U value of glass in LB and HB according to the calculation result. if so, I think it is a tedious process at sometime, 



Is my understood correct.



Solon.

Solon,

You understood me perfectly. That is a precise way to go about it. LBNL Windows Tool can help you calculate U-factor of different window assemblies. The tool has a good database for glazing and a few options for frames.



If you have a detailed section for the window assembly, then you could calculate the U-factor for frames using THERM, and use the frame U-value in LBNL Windows to create your custom frame. LBNL Windows will write an .idf file that you can directly import your workflow using Honeybee_import WINDOW IDF Report component.



Hope this helps!

-Devang

Sure Solon,

To get help with the workflows, visit [this](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/), and type "LBNL" in the search box. That will give you all the relevant recipes available.

-Devang

Hi Devang,

Thank you very much.



Solon.
